testsuite.name: Scenario: Test slide transitions with response areas

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test slide transitions with response areas

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test slide transitions with response areas

testcase.name: And I choose creating new Slideshow from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test slide transitions with response areas

testcase.name: And Slideshow Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test slide transitions with response areas

testcase.name: When I click inside the slideshow content in the editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test slide transitions with response areas

testcase.name: And I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test slide transitions with response areas

testcase.name: When I choose "Mathematical Formula" link from the dialog and complete the correct answer
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test slide transitions with response areas

testcase.name: And I click OK
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test slide transitions with response areas

testcase.name: Then I see the "Mathematical Formula" Question Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test slide transitions with response areas

testcase.name: When I click on the "Mathematical Formula" Question Widget in the question editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test slide transitions with response areas

testcase.name: And I drag the Element-In marker 400 pixels right
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test slide transitions with response areas

testcase.name: When I click to Preview the Slideshow
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test slide transitions with response areas

testcase.name: Then I am previewing the Slideshow
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test slide transitions with response areas

testcase.name: When I begin playback of the Slideshow
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test slide transitions with response areas

testcase.name: Then I don't see the Mathematical Formula response area
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test slide transitions with response areas

testcase.name: When I click the Next slide button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test slide transitions with response areas

testcase.name: Then I see the Mathematical Formula response area
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test slide transitions with response areas

testcase.name: And I close the question preview window
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test slide transitions with response areas

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test slide transitions with response areas

testsuite.system-out: Scenario: Ensure How Did I Do doesn't appear when slideshow pauses with no response area visible (UW-1071) ?[90m# question/slideshow/TestSlideButtons.feature:24?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI enter valid information for the question name as "?[0m?[32m?[1mNew Question 2?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.enterQuestionName(String)?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI click the Slideshow Audio File Manager button?[0m ?[90m# AddSlideshowSteps.clickAudioFileManagerButton()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI click the audio file named "?[0m?[32m?[1mAudio_Test.mp3?[0m?[32m"?[0m ?[90m# AddSlideshowSteps.clickOnAudioFile(String)?[0m # Drag a couple of pause markers into the waveform: ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI click the New Pause button?[0m ?[90m# AddSlideshowSteps.clickNewPauseButton()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI drag the new Pause marker ?[0m?[32m?[1m200?[0m?[32m pixels right?[0m ?[90m# AddSlideshowSteps.dragNewPauseMarker(int)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI click the New Pause button?[0m ?[90m# AddSlideshowSteps.clickNewPauseButton()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI drag the new Pause marker ?[0m?[32m?[1m600?[0m?[32m pixels right?[0m ?[90m# AddSlideshowSteps.dragNewPauseMarker(int)?[0m # Add a response area to appear in between the pauses: ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI click inside the slideshow content in the editor?[0m ?[90m# AddSlideshowSteps.clickSlideshowContentArea()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.clickInsertResponseAreaButton()?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI choose "?[0m?[32m?[1mMathematical Formula?[0m?[32m" link from the dialog and complete the correct answer?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.chooseTypeAndCompleteCorrectAnswer(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI click OK?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.clickResponseDialogOkButton()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI see the "?[0m?[32m?[1mMathematical Formula?[0m?[32m" Question Widget in the question text section?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.assertQuestionWidgetIsInserted(String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI click on the "?[0m?[32m?[1mMathematical Formula?[0m?[32m" Question Widget in the question editor?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.clickQuestionWidget(String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI drag the Element-In marker ?[0m?[32m?[1m400?[0m?[32m pixels right?[0m ?[90m# AddSlideshowSteps.dragElementInMarker(int)?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI click to Preview the Slideshow?[0m ?[90m# AddSlideshowSteps.clickPreviewButton()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI resize the slideshow preview window to the default size?[0m ?[90m# AddSlideshowSteps.resizeSlideshowPreview()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI am previewing the Slideshow?[0m ?[90m# AddSlideshowSteps.assertSlideshowPreviewPage()?[0m # Confirm How Did I Do button NOT presented when slideshow pauses while no response area visible: ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI begin playback of the Slideshow?[0m ?[90m# AddSlideshowSteps.beginPlayback()?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mthe Slideshow pause bar appears?[0m ?[90m# AddSlideshowSteps.assertPauseBarAppears()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI don't see the Mathematical Formula response area?[0m ?[90m# MathmeticalFormulaElementSteps.assertMathFormulaQuestionNotVisible()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI don't see How Did I Do on the slide pause bar?[0m ?[90m# AddSlideshowSteps.assertHowDidIDoNotVisible()?[0m #
